= Simplified installation instructions for ICAT 4.2 =

Please note that these instructions should not be considered as definitive. The definitive documentation for ICAT may be found below:

http://www.icatproject.org/mvn/site/icat

To obtain the materials, check out the materials from SVN using a command such as the following:

svn co https://icatproject.googlecode.com/svn/ops/icat42

Read the file called readme.txt and follow the instructions.
